text.div:
NCDHC Audit Role Type

http://hl7.org.au/fhir/ch/v1/CodeSystem/ncdhc-audit-role-type-1

National Children's Digital Health Collaborative - Audit Role Type which is recorded to capture the role and name of the agent. The codes will be used to represent the different types of users which is applicable to the role type of Audit Log.

name: ncdhc-audit-role-type
title: NCDHC Audit Role Type
description: National Children's Digital Health Collaborative - Audit Role Type which is recorded to capture the role and name of the agent. The codes will be used to represent the different types of users which is applicable to the role type of Audit Log.
